ValidationRule.description: A component that is of type checkbox must have either a non-blank phrase or a non-blank picklist.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Type__c, "checkbox"), ISBLANK( Form_Phrase__c ), ISBLANK( Form_Picklist__c ), NOT (Hidden__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A component that is of type checkbox must have either a non-blank phrase or a non-blank picklist.
